scripts.build: npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(fs.existsSync('public')) fs.rmSync('public', {recursive:true, force:true}); fs.mkdirSync('public'); const copy=(s,d)=>{if(fs.lstatSync(s).isDirectory()){if(!fs.existsSync(d))fs.mkdirSync(d);fs.readdirSync(s).forEach(f=>copy(path.join(s,f),path.join(d,f)))}else{fs.copyFileSync(s,d)}}; copy('../client/dist', 'public')"
